Articles.Content:
I'm big ME fan, and one time I thought "Why don't make it on KSP?". Well, why not?

So, legend of first ME, M35 "MAKO"

Have TWR>1, similar suspension, but can't ride on a wall.

M-29 "Grizzly". Well, i don't ride on it on ME, but i can ride it on KSP!

"Protagonist" in armored vehicles part on second ME - M44 "Hammerhead"

Not so weak like real Hammerhead.

Main taxi for infantry - UT-47 "Kodiak"

Don't have zero element core, but still nice.

Tomkah. For more information ask Krogan.

Rare tech - M-080. This tank with gun you can see only on ME2, without - 2 and 3.

F-61 "Trident". Alliance fighter, a few info about it ingame.

Also i try make one time "Normandy" SR-1

Thanks for watching!

Awesome job on all of those! Usually replicas have poor flight properties, but you seem to have solved that...any plans on posting .craft files?

Also, maybe the Normandy will stop flexing like a wet noodle come 0.24 with its rigid joints

Well, it's all flying on infinity fuel, cause i can't use mass effect technology. It's flying nice, but don't flying without debug(can be fixed on Kodiak, Hammerhead and maybe MAKO).

About .craft - i post it a few days later on this thread.
Really cool! Could you tell me what's the mod that allows you to modify the grey wheels to make em' larger, like the Mako or the grizzly?

On 16.12.2015 at 0:09 AM, Tomato29 said:

Really cool! Could you tell me what's the mod that allows you to modify the grey wheels to make em' larger, like the Mako or the grizzly?

Sorry for THIS late response, but there is usual size wheels. Just a bit more wide, but there is just two of them on each place.
Thread punted to the Spacecraft Exchange as it is more about craft
Why didn't I see these before. They are great! You did an amazing job on the shape of these craft, good job!
